description: A threat actor modified the source code of at least five plugins hosted on WordPress.org to include malicious PHP scripts that create new accounts with administrative privileges on websites running them. [...]
title: Plugins on WordPress.org backdoored in supply chain attack

description: Over 100,000 sites have been impacted in a supply chain attack by the Polyfill.io service after a Chinese company acquired the domain and the script was modified to redirect users to malicious and scam sites. [...]
title: Polyfill.io JavaScript supply chain attack impacts over 100K sites

description: The Medusa banking trojan for Android has re-emerged after almost a year of keeping a lower profile in campaigns targeting France, Italy, the United States, Canada, Spain, the United Kingdom, and Turkey. [...]
title: New Medusa malware variants target Android users in seven countries

description: Luxury retailer Neiman Marcus confirmed it suffered a data breach after hackers attempted to sell the company's database stolen in recent Snowflake data theft attacks. [...]
title: Neiman Marcus confirms data breach after Snowflake account hack

description: The FBI is warning of cybercriminals posing as law firms and lawyers that offer cryptocurrency recovery services to victims of investment scams and steal funds and personal information. [...]
title: FBI warns of fake law firms targeting crypto scam victims

description: P2PInfect, originally a dormant peer-to-peer malware botnet with unclear motives, has finally come alive to deploy a ransomware module and a cryptominer in attacks on Redis servers. [...]
title: P2PInfect botnet targets REdis servers with new ransomware module
